project.contribution: UI Developer | Theme Designer | Template Developer | Common UI Error Debugger
project.detail:
ProQ View â€“ Get real-time power quality (PQ) data from ProQ 100 meter. The data can be analysed for comprehensive monitoring of electrical and power quality parameters, and overall system health. From the raw data received from ProQ 100, ProQ View provides a wide range of analytics, including specialised functionalities as follows:
                                          Monitoring of real-time power quality parameters.
                                          Logging of PQ events (sag, swell, interruption and RVC) and transients logging with detailed information.
project.Learning: Teamwork, Debugging, Work Performance, Task Management
steps: Designed a modern UI for the admin panel.
Implemented template repository for other backend developers.
Explored multiple libraries for UI enhancements.
Resolved common UI errors and provided training.
